class_notes: Registration for this class is only for students in the Transactional Certificate Program. DO NOT TRY TO ENROLL IF YOU DID NOT RECEIVE A SPECIFIC ENROLLMENT WINDOW!
course_description: This course is designed for those liberal arts majors who know nothing about accounting and finance. Students will learn about the fundamental financial statement concepts. Then the course will turn to the study of how lawyers use those concepts in practice.
